Name: Kusava
Title: Kusava
Desc:
Kusava, Kusava~â™ª
Memories and dreams are full of power.
It is the fruit of flowering plants, and also the seed of new life.
They are the temporary dwelling place of Aranara memories, and they give Aranara strength.

Talent.Name: Kusava
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> $[K56] a maximum of 2 cards with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand. For each card you $[K56], this card accumulates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Memories and Dreams</color> point (maximum of 2).\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Skill:</color> If you haven't played an Action Card this round, consume 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Memories and Dreams</color> point, and this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
